quotes.quote: One can only continue to expect to be read if one omits everything that is unimportant.
It's very important to be just to other people. It takes years and years of living to learn that injustice against oneself is always unimportant
Little people belittle people. Great people make people feel great.
Most of our life is unimportant, filled with trivial things from morning till night. But when it is transformed by love it is of interest even to the angels.
One of the most significant design principles is to omit the unimportant in order to emphasize the important.
It may be in seemingly unimportant things that a man expresses his passion for perfection, yet they will count heavily in the long run.
Failure is unimportant. It takes courage to make a fool of yourself.
The world is unimportant and whoever recognizes this conquers his liberty.
People who cannot distinguish between good and bad language, or who regard the distinction as unimportant, are unlikely to think carefully about anything else.
They misunderstand us, they unwittingly belittle us, they do something that they think is nice that instead just makes us mad. And those are the good ones.
Whatever is not happening now is unimportant; it is merely curious.
The future will one day be the present and will seem as unimportant as the present does now.
People use ridicule to belittle something perceived big enough to fear.
People often belittle the place where they were born.
Only one valid law: never belittle others. Never belittle yourself.

Sometimes an unimportant incident is capable of turning everything beautiful into a moment of anxiety. We insist on seeing the mote in the eye and forget about the mountains, the fields and the olive groves.
Keep away from people who try to belittle your ambitions. Small people always do that, but the really great make you feel that you, too, can become great.
No matter how small and unimportant what we are doing may seem, if we do it well, it may soon become the step that will lead us to better things.
Insight without action is worthless.
When it comes to art, money is an unimportant detail. It just happens to be a huge unimportant detail.
We belittle God when we go through the outward motions of worship and take no pleasure in His person.
Everyone is a bore to someone. That is unimportant. The thing to avoid is being a bore to oneself.
